INST1:
Your goal in this task is to keep the ball near the target using your mouse or pointing device.  The ball moves on its own, but it impacted by how you move the mouse.  If possible, keep the ball in the center of the ring, or as close as possible to the inner circle as you can.  The test lasts  <TIME> seconds.

Press any key to begin
